segments.text: When do children start school in your country ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Normally at six . Before that , they spend several years in the kindergarten or pre-school education center .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But thats only in the cities , isnt it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . In the countryside , things are more complicated .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can kids in the countryside get equally good benefits and education like those in the cities ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends . In some poor , underdeveloped areas , children's education is a problem . Many kids cannot afford to go to school .
segments.speaker: S2
